entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
